description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
year the data point was obtained
month the data point was obtained
day of the month the data point was obtained
name of the participant
age presented in years – see metadata for source of age
sex of the participant
species of individuals participating in the study - chimpanzee/orangutan
whether the participant started with the training or the test
session count across conditions
session count within condition
presentation of the experiment to the participants - usually numerical
test = iconic gestures / training = pointing gestures
apparatus on the left – pulldown / pushin / turncrank / pushleftright
apparatus on the right – pulldown / pushin / turncrank / pushleftright
tone played at the left apparatus
tone played at the right apparatus
side indicated by the gesture
side the participant approached
whether the approached side was the indicated side
whether the participant reached the training criterion at any point during the experiment
